short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See how your links will look before you share them on social media. Get the perfect preview every time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop social media preview surprises!

Instantly see a sample preview of how your link will look when shared on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with  [Your extension name].

Boost your social media presence by ensuring your links are presented with the perfect image and title. Never again wonder how your link will appear when shared.

Take control of your social media sharing today! Add  [Your extension name] to Chrome now!
